net.proteusframework.ui.background

Class BackgroundService

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.background.BackgroundService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.proteusframework.core.progress.ProgressService<BackgroundTask<?>,BackgroundService>

    @Configurable
public class BackgroundService
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.proteusframework.core.progress.ProgressService<BackgroundTask<?>,BackgroundService>
    Service for managing background tasks.

    A BackgroundService is automatically shutdown when the Component used to create it is closed.

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)

      • parallel

        @Contract(value="_ -> !null")
public static BackgroundService parallel(@NonNull Component component)
        Create a background service with a thread-pool matching the number of processors available to the VM.

        A BackgroundService is automatically shutdown when the Component used to create it is closed.

        Parameters:
        component - the component.
        Returns:
        the background service.

        A BackgroundService is automatically shutdown when the Component used to create it is closed.

        Parameters:

      • setHibernateEnabled

        public void setHibernateEnabled(boolean hibernateEnabled)
        Set the hibernate enabled flag. If true, hibernate will be enabled before tasks are run.

        Defaults to false.

        If you have a long running task that loads or creates a lot of hibernate entities, then you will need to ensure that you periodically clear out the session. Also, make use of ScrollableResultsIterators like that returned by QLResolver.iterate() to efficiently process a large number of entities.

        Parameters:
        hibernateEnabled - the setup hibernate flag.
        See Also:
        QLResolverOptions.setFetchSize(int), QLResolver.iterate(), DAOHelper.flushSession(), DAOHelper.flushAndClearSession()

      • setUpdateInterval

        public void setUpdateInterval(@NonNull java.time.Duration updateInterval)
        Set the update interval. This is the minimum amount of time to wait before checking if progress has been made on submitted tasks. Defaults to 5 seconds.
        Parameters:
        updateInterval - the update interval. Must be greater than or equal to 500 milliseconds.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shutdown service.

        A BackgroundService is automatically shutdown when the Component used to create it is closed.

      • singleThreaded

        @Contract(value="_ -> !null")

        Returns:
        the background service.
